General.Name: Hua Yuan Property Co Ltd
General.Description: Huayuan Property Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, sale, management, and leasing of real estate properties in China. The company develops residential buildings, affordable housings, senior apartments, villas, business apartments, office buildings, hotels, shopping malls, and other properties. Huayuan Property Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Building 11, HuaYuan Enterprise Center, Beijing, China, 100044
